job.title: Software Engineer, Backend
job.description: pRidecell Inc is the leading IoT platform provider for digital fleet transformation Ridecell brings the transformative power of IoT to mobility and logistic fleets with the only platform and solutions built specifically for fleets Fleet IoT converts siloed data streams into realtime insights takes advantage of digital vehicle control and turns todays manual processes into automated workflowsppnbspppRidecell powers some of the most successful fleets in cities across Europe and North America These include services by Ferrovial Groupe Renault Gig Car Share from AAA and Toyota Sweden Ridecell teams are operating globally out of offices in San Francisco Madrid Paris Berlin and Pune IndiappbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliContribute to the design architecture and build of our core platformliliTake ownership over project timelines and deliverablesliliHelp scale the platform and build out new featuresliliWork with customers and launch teams with occasional travelliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliFluency in Python amp Django or confident that you can get there quicklynbspliliExperience with RESTful APIs and API designlili3 years of experience in handson professional software development internships includedliliYou always leave code better than you found itliliSelfdirected but also work well with other engineersliliExcited about working for a startup and moving quicklyliliExperience with using performance tools and optimization techniquesliliMust be willing to work onsite in our San Francisco office in the futureliulpbrppBenefitspulli401kliliUnlimited PTOliliFull health Vision and Dental benefitsliulpbrppFor the next step of your application please complete this timed HackerRank testpphttpshrgsBackendEngTestp
